Html:
Hi,

my Project won't start because i get a 404 at http://firstfloorsoftware.com/ModernUI. Is there way to host the Files local?

Best regards,

Joerg
What do you mean with your project won't start? http://firstfloorsoftware.com/ModernUI is an xml namespace, it's not a valid resource on the web.

Sorry, it was my fault. My project stops working at the Line "xmlns:mui="http://firstfloorsoftware.com/ModernUI"" in MainWindows.xaml. I thought there was a problem with ModernUI but there was a total different problem.
